description: Pochayiv has been put under quarantine by police after dozens of people became infected with coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Ukrainian town sealed off after monastery outbreak
title_page: Coronavirus: Ukrainian town sealed off after monastery outbreak - BBC News
maintext: Lavra leaders denied they had an outbreak but on Tuesday the monastery told worshippers: "Take away the children, you should all leave Lavra. Nobody walks through the territory. If we do not, there will be great trouble."
